casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 13, 2010

[Cite as 0511312010 Case Announcements #2, 2010-Ohio-2077.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2005-2364. State v. Perez.

Clark C.P. No. 03-CR-10I0. This cause came on for further consideration of appellant’s motion for appointment of counsel to file an application for reopening. Upon consideration thereof,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted and that Luigia Tenuta of Columbus, Ohio, is appointed to represent appellant in this ease for the purpose of filing an application for reopening.
